00043 CCorresponding3D2DPoints& CCorresponding3D2DPoints::operator=(const CCorresponding3D2DPoints& SourcePointSet)
00044 {
00045         // overloading of assignment operator
00046         if (this != &SourcePointSet)
00047         {
00048                 // ok to do assignment
00049                 k_Copy3D2DPoints(&m_PointSets,SourcePointSet.GetConstT3D2DPointsPtr());
00050         }
00051         else
00052         {
00053                 ostringstream ost;
00054                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::operator=() Cannot assign CCorresponding3D2DPoints to itself" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00055                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00056         }
00057         return *this;
00058 
00059 }

00111 bool CCorresponding3D2DPoints::Point2DInUse(unsigned int Index) const
00112 {
00113         if (Index>m_PointSets.NumberOfSets)
00114         {
00115                 ostringstream ost;
00116                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::Point2DInUse() Index (" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00117                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00118                 return false;
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122                 return m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt2DInUse;
00123         }
00124 }
00125

00156 CPoint3D<float> CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetPoint3D(unsigned int Index) const
00157 {
00158         if (Index>m_PointSets.NumberOfSets)
00159         {
00160                 ostringstream ost;
00161                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetPoint3D() Index (" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00162                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00163                 return CPoint3D<float>(-1,-1,-1);
00164         }
00165         else
00166         {
00167                 return CPoint3D<float>(m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt3D.x,
00168                                                            m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt3D.y,
00169                                                            m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt3D.z);
00170         }
00171 }
00172 
00173 CPoint2D<float> CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetPoint2D(unsigned int Index) const
00174 {
00175         if (Index>m_PointSets.NumberOfSets)
00176         {
00177                 ostringstream ost;
00178                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetPoint2D() Index (" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00179                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00180                 return CPoint2D<float>(-1,-1);
00181         }
00182         else
00183         {
00184                 return CPoint2D<float>(m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt2D.x,
00185                                                            m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Pnt2D.y);
00186         }
00187 }

00189 int CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetId(unsigned int Index) const
00190 {
00191         if (Index>m_PointSets.NumberOfSets)
00192         {
00193                 ostringstream ost;
00194                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::GetId() Index (" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00195                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00196                 return 0;
00197         }
00198         else
00199         {
00200                 return m_PointSets.pSet[Index].Id;
00201         }
00202 }

00213 
00214 bool CCorresponding3D2DPoints::AddPointSetAndId(const CPoint3D<float>& Pnt3D, const CPoint2D<float>& Pnt2D, int Id)
00215 {
00216         T2DFloat P2d;
00217         P2d.x=Pnt2D.GetX();
00218         P2d.y=Pnt2D.GetY();
00219         T3DFloat P3d;
00220         P3d.x=Pnt3D.GetX();
00221         P3d.y=Pnt3D.GetY();
00222         P3d.z=Pnt3D.GetZ();
00223         if (k_AddPointSetAndIdTo3D2DPoints(&P3d,&P2d,Id,&m_PointSets)!=true)
00224         {
00225                 ostringstream ost;
00226                 ost << "CCorresponding3D2DPoints::AddPointSetAndId() Failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00227                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00228                 return false;
00229         }
00230         else
00231         {
00232                 return true;
00233         }
00234 }
00235 
00236 bool CCorresponding3D2DPoints::AddPoint3DAndId(const CPoint3D<float>& Pnt3D, int Id)
00237 {
00238         T3DFloat P3d;
00239         P3d.x=Pnt3D.GetX();
00240         P3d.y=Pnt3D.GetY();

00413 
00414 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CCorresponding3D2DPoints& PointSets)
00415 {
00416         s << "**************** CCorresponding3D2DPoints info ********************\n" <<
00417                 " Number of point sets inserted: " << PointSets.GetTotalPointSets() <<
00418                 " Allocated point sets: " << PointSets.GetConstT3D2DPointsPtr()->AllocatedSets << endl;
00419         unsigned int count;
00420         for(count=0; count<PointSets.GetTotalPointSets(); count++)
00421         {
00422                 if (PointSets.Point3DInUse(count))
00423                 {
00424                         s << " 3D pnt = " << PointSets.GetPoint3D(count);
00425                 }
00426                 else
00427                 {
00428                         s << " 3D pnt = not in use";
00429                 }
00430                 if (PointSets.Point2DInUse(count))
00431                 {
00432                         s << " 2D pnt = " << PointSets.GetPoint2D(count);
00433                 }
00434                 else
00435                 {
00436                         s << " 2D pnt = not in use";
00437                 }
00438                 if (PointSets.IdInUse(count))
00439                 {
00440                         s << " Id = " << PointSets.GetId(count);
00441                 }
00442                 else
00443                 {
00444                         s << " Id = not in use";
00445                 }
00446                 s << endl;
00447         }
00448 
00449         return s;
00450 }
